summary: This is an email forwarding Judge Alison Nathan's opinion on Ghislaine Maxwell's pretrial motions. The opinion granted the motion to sever perjury counts but denied most other motions, while deferring a decision on suppression motions related to Boies Schiller materials.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: Issued the opinion on Ghislaine Maxwell's pretrial motions, granting severance of perjury counts but denying most other motions.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the pretrial motions opinion; her motions to sever perjury counts were granted while others were denied.

connections.description: Judge Nathan ruled on Maxwell's pretrial motions in her criminal case.

events.title: Issuance of Opinion on Maxwell Pretrial Motions
events.description: Judge Alison Nathan issued an opinion on Ghislaine Maxwell's pretrial motions, granting severance of perjury counts but denying most other motions.

keyFacts: Judge Alison Nathan granted Ghislaine Maxwell's motion to sever the perjury counts from her other charges.
Judge Nathan denied the majority of Maxwell's remaining pretrial motions.
The suppression motions regarding Boies Schiller materials were not addressed in this opinion and will be decided separately 'in due course'.
